queries.query: SELECT * FROM ingredients;
SELECT * FROM products;
UPDATE ingredients SET ingredientname = ?, quantity = ?, cost = ? WHERE ingredientid = ?;
INSERT INTO ingredients(ingredientname, quantity, cost) VALUES (?, ?, ?);
DELETE FROM ingredients WHERE ingredientid = ?;
UPDATE products SET productname = ?, ingredientids = ?, saleprice = ? WHERE productid = ?;
INSERT INTO products(productname, ingredientids, saleprice) VALUES (?, ?, ?);
DELETE FROM products WHERE productid = ?;
INSERT INTO orders(productids, cashier, transactiontime, price) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?);
SELECT orderid FROM orders ORDER BY orderid DESC LIMIT 1;
UPDATE ingredients AS i SET quantity = i.quantity - 1 WHERE i.ingredientid IN ( SELECT unnest(p.ingredientids) FROM products AS p WHERE p.productname = ? );
SELECT productids FROM orders WHERE transactiontime BETWEEN ? AND ? AND array_length(productids, 1) > 1;
SELECT refresh_product_prices_callable();

SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) as popularity FROM ( SELECT orderid, unnest(productids) as product_id FROM orders WHERE transactiontime >= ? AND transactiontime <= ? ) subquery GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY popularity DESC LIMIT ?;
